preqs: One of MTH2010,MTH2015 or ENG2005Recommended units: MTH2032 or MTH2040

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2010, MTH2015}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ASP2051, ASP2052, ASP3052}
Unit was previously coded {ASP3042, ASP3051%, ASP3121, MAA3061, MAA3242, MAT3061, MAT3142}
Unit was previously coded {ASP3042, ASP3051%, ASP3121, MAA3061, MAA3242, MAT3061, MAT3142}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ASP2051, ASP2052, ASP3052}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH2010, MTH2015} OR  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ENG2005})

description: Newtonian physics and Einstein's Special Theory of Relativity, the geometry of space-time, the Minkowski metric, Lorentz transformations, k-calculus, and four-vectors; the physics of space-time, momentum and energy; classical paradoxes; other metrics, Black Holes; observation of the Universe relevant to Cosmology; the expansion of the Universe, the Cosmic Background Radiation; the evolution of the Universe, propagation of light; primordial elements and recent observations.
